message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $95.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to consider it, but I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $105.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $100.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not convinced that's the best price for the product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $108.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $102.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $110. I'm willing to offer it to you for $109.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $106.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $110. I'm willing to offer it to you for $107.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $104.
